channel.title: Print – Matthew Gordils
channel.description: Designer, Illustrator, and front end developer

item.title: Southpaw Circus
item.dc:creator: artomatt
item.description:
The Southpaw Circus is a fictional event featuring animal boxing between some of the most ferocious contenders. The champion is crowned with the title the King of the Jungle. The project included a logo mark, poster series and collection of trading cards featuring the fierce competitors. The cards also included fighter information and the history […]

The post Southpaw Circus appeared first on Matthew Gordils.
item.content:encoded:
The Southpaw Circus is a fictional event featuring animal boxing between some of the most ferocious contenders. The champion is crowned with the title the King of the Jungle. The project included a logo mark, poster series and collection of trading cards featuring the fierce competitors. The cards also included fighter information and the history of the event. The Southpaw Circus posters and trading cards showcase a hand drawn script inspired by from 1920’s boxing posters.

The post Southpaw Circus appeared first on Matthew Gordils.

item.title: Reel Food
item.dc:creator: artomatt
item.description:
Reel Food is a fictional restaurant identity showcasing classic films during a dinner-theater dining experience. The project includes a menu and a take-home bag. Tickets were created for the restaurant and popcorn boxes were designed to offer a cinematic experience. There is a box collection of classic food movies along with recipe cards in each […]

The post Reel Food appeared first on Matthew Gordils.
item.content:encoded:
Reel Food is a fictional restaurant identity showcasing classic films during a dinner-theater dining experience. The project includes a menu and a take-home bag. Tickets were created for the restaurant and popcorn boxes were designed to offer a cinematic experience. There is a box collection of classic food movies along with recipe cards in each movie case. With the project is a flip book of everyones favorite Italian, romantic, K9 couple.

The post Reel Food appeared first on Matthew Gordils.

item.title: Eames Catalog
item.dc:creator: artomatt
item.description:
A catalog of some of the most well known chairs of the influential designers, Charles and Ray Eames. These chairs are definitely on my wish list.

The post Eames Catalog appeared first on Matthew Gordils.
